thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Steven Behr
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Steven Behr

author: Steven Behr
title: Steven Behr
text:
Our church at Eagle vale wanted a pull up banner after going to various places at Minto couldnt open the file and do the order. I went to Easysigns and they not only opened the file but printed the banner within a day.
Price is very competitive and suited our budget and is happy do a another sign in the future.
Banner is fantastic in our church grounds and makes it alot more see able for new people coming into the church.
